GK20hdratn_u:2: pādāgrasthitayā muhuḥ stanabhareṇānītayā namratāṃ śaṃbhoḥ saspṛhalocanatrayapathaṃ yāntyā tadārādhane |
GK20hdratn_u:3: hrīmatyā śirasīhitaḥ sapulakasvedodgamotkampayā viśliṣyan kusumāñjalir girijayā kṣipto 'ntare pātu vaḥ || 1 || (1.1)
GK20hdratn_u:5: autsukyena kṛtatvarā sahabhuvā vyāvartamānā hriyā tais tair bandhuvadhūjanasya vacanair nītābhimukhyaṃ punaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:6: dṛṣṭvāgre varam āttasādhvasarasā gaurī nave saṃgame saṃrohatpulakā hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāstu vaḥ || 2 || (1.2)
GK20hdratn_u:8: krodheddhair dṛṣtipātais tribhir upaśamitā vahnayo 'mī trayo 'pi
GK20hdratn_u:10: dakṣaḥ stautyasya patnī vilapati kṛpaṇaṃ vidrutaṃ cāpi devaiḥ śaṃsan nityāttahāso makhamathanavidhau pātu devyai śivo vaḥ || 3 || (1.3)
GK20hdratn_u:12: jitam uḍupatinā namaḥ surebhyo dvijavṛṣabhā nirupadravā bhavantu |
GK20hdratn_u:13: bhavatu ca pṛthivī samṛddhasasyā pratapatu candravapur narendracandraḥ || 4 || (1.4)
GK20hdratn_u:16: adyāhaṃ vasantotsave sabahumānam āhūya nānādigdeśāgatena rājñaḥ śrīharṣadevasya pādapadmopajīvinā rājasamūhenokto yathā |
GK20hdratn_u:17: asmatsvāminā śrīharṣadevenāpūrvavasturacanālaṅkṛtā ratnāvalī nāma nāṭikā kṛtety asmābhiḥ śrotraparamparayā śrutā na tu prayogato dṛṣṭā |
GK20hdratn_u:18: tat tasyaiva rājñaḥ sakalajanahṛdayāhlādino bahumānād asmāsu cānugrahabuddhyā yathāvat prayogeṇa tvayā nāṭayitavyeti |
GK20hdratn_u:19: tad yāvad idānīṃ nepathyaracanāṃ kṛtvā yathābhilaṣitaṃ saṃpādayāmi |
GK20hdratn_u:24: śrīharṣo nipuṇaḥ kaviḥ pariṣad apy eṣā guṇagrāhiṇī loke hāri ca vatsarājacaritaṃ nāṭye ca dakṣā vayaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:25: vastv ekaikam apīha vāñchitaphalaprāpteḥ padaṃ kiṃ punar madbhāgyopacayād ayaṃ samuditaḥ sarvo guṇānāṃ gaṇaḥ || 5 || (1.5)
GK20hdratn_u:26: tad yāvad ahaṃ gṛhaṃ gatvā gṛhiṇīm āhūya saṃgītakam anutiṣṭhāmi |
GK20hdratn_u:47: mama uṇa mandabhāiṇīe ekkā jjevva duhidā |
GK20hdratn_u:48: sā vi tae kahiṃ pi desantare diṇṇā |
GK20hdratn_u:49: dūraṭṭhideṇa jāmāduṇā se pāṇiggahaṇaṃ kadhaṃ bhavissadi tti imāe cintāe appā vi ṇa me paḍibhādi
GK20hdratn_u:55: dvīpād anyasmād api madhyād api jalanidher diśo 'py antāt |
GK20hdratn_u:56: ānīya jhaṭiti ghaṭayati vidhir abhimatam abhimukhībhūtaḥ || 6 || (1.6)
GK20hdratn_u:66: nanv ayaṃ mama kanīyān bhrātā gṛhītayaugandharāyaṇabhūmikaḥ prāpta eva |
GK20hdratn_u:76_0: anyathā kva siddhādeśapratyayaprārthitāyāḥ siṃhaleśvaraduhituḥ samudre pravahaṇabhaṅganimagnāyāḥ
GK20hdratn_u:76_1: phalakāsādanaṃ kva ca kauśāmbīyena vaṇijā siṃhalebhyaḥ pratyāgacchatā tadavasthāyāḥ
GK20hdratn_u:79: mayāpi caināṃ devīhaste sagauravaṃ nikṣipatā yuktam evānuṣṭhitam |
GK20hdratn_u:81: bābhravyo 'pi kañcukī vasubhūtinā siṃhaleśvarāmātyena saha kathaṃ katham api samudrād uttīrya kosalocchittaye gatasya rumaṇvato milita iti |
GK20hdratn_u:82: tad evaṃ niṣpannaprāyam api prayojanaṃ na me dhṛtim āvahati |
GK20hdratn_u:86: siddher bhrāntir nāsti satyaṃ tathāpi svecchācārī bhīta evāsmi bhartuḥ || 7 || (1.7)
GK20hdratn_u:91: yathāyam abhihanyamānamṛdumṛdaṅgānugatasaṃgītamadhuraḥ puraḥ paurāṇām uccarati carcarīdhvanis tathā tarkayāmi |
GK20hdratn_u:92: madanamahamahīyāṃsaṃ purajanapramodam avalokayituṃ prāsādābhimukhaṃ prasthito deva iti |
GK20hdratn_u:96: ya eṣa viśrāntavigrahakatho ratimāñ janasya citte vasan priyavasantaka eva sākṣāt |
GK20hdratn_u:98: tad yāvad gṛhaṃ gatvā kāryaśeṣaṃ cintayāmi |
GK20hdratn_u:101: tataḥ praviśaty āsanastho gṛhītavasantotsavaveṣo rājā vasantakaś ca |
GK20hdratn_u:108: rājyaṃ nirjitaśatru yogyasacive nyastaḥ samasto bharaḥ samyakpālanalālitāḥ praśamitāśeṣopasargāḥ prajāḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:109: pradyotasya sutā vasantasamayas tvaṃ ceti nāmnā dhṛtiṃ kāmaḥ kāmam upaitv ayaṃ mama punar manye mahān utsavaḥ || 9 || (1.9)
GK20hdratn_u:115: ṇa bhavado ṇa kāmadevassa mama jjevva ekkassa bamhaṇassa aaṃ maaṇamahūsavo tti jeṇa piavaasseṇa tumaṃ ti mantīadi |
GK20hdratn_u:122: parāṃ koṭim adhirohati pramodaḥ puraḥ paurānām |
GK20hdratn_u:124: kīrṇaiḥ piṣṭātakaughaiḥ kṛtadivasamukhaiḥ kuṅkumakṣodagaurair hemālaṅkārabhābhir bharanamitaśikhaiḥ śekharaiḥ kaiṅkirātaiḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:126: api ca |dhārāyantravimuktasaṃtatapayaḥpūraplute sarvataḥ sadyaḥ sāndravimardakardamakṛtakrīḍe kṣaṇam prāṅgaṇe |
GK20hdratn_u:127: uddāmapramadākapolanipatatsindūrarāgāruṇaiḥ saindūrīkriyate janena caraṇanyāsaiḥ puraḥ kuṭṭimam (1.15) Vidūṣakaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:129: edaṃ pi dāva suviaḍḍhajaṇāpūridasiṅgaajalapahāramukkasikkāramaṇoharaṃ vāravilāsiṇījaṇavilasidaṃ avaloedu piavaasso |
GK20hdratn_u:142: esā khu maaṇiā maaṇasarisaṃ vasantāhiṇaaṃ ṇaccantī cūdaladiāe saha ido jjevva āacchadi |
GK20hdratn_u:143: tataḥ praviśato madalīlāṃ nāṭayantyau dvipadīkhaṇḍaṃ gāyantyau cetyau |
GK20hdratn_u:149: iha paḍhamaṃ mahumāso jaṇassa hiaāi kuṇai mauāiṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:154: srastaḥ sragdāmaśobhāṃ tyajati viracitām ākulaḥ keśapāśaḥ kṣībāyā nūpurau ca dviguṇataram imau krandataḥ pādalagnau |
GK20hdratn_u:155: vyastaḥ kampānubandhād anavaratam uro hanti hāro 'yam asyāḥ krīḍantyāḥ pīḍayeva stanabharavinamanmadhyabhaṅgānapekṣam (1.20) Vidūṣakaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:157: ahaṃ pi edāṇaṃ baddhapariarāṇaṃ majjhe ṇaccanto maaṇamahūsavaṃ māṇaissaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:217: nanv ājñāpayatīty eva ramaṇīyaṃ viśeśato 'dya madanamahotsave |
GK20hdratn_u:225: ajja mae maarandujjāṇaṃ gadua rattāsoasaṃṭhidassa bhaavado kusumāuhassa pūā ṇivvattidavvā
GK20hdratn_u:233: tahiṃ jevva gacchamha jeṇa tahiṃ gadassa mama vi bamhaṇassa sotthivāaṇaṃ kiṃ pi bhavissadi
GK20hdratn_u:237: ayam aham āgata eva makarandodyānam iti |
GK20hdratn_u:268: iha hi udyadvidrumakāntibhiḥ kisalayais tāmrāṃ tviṣaṃ bibhrato bhṛṅgālīvirutaiḥ kalair aviśadavyāhāralīlābhṛtaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:269: ghūrṇanto malayānilāhaticalaiḥ śākhāsamūhair muhur bhrāntiṃ prāpya madhuprasaṅgam adhunā mattā ivāmī drumāḥ || 17 || (1.17)
GK20hdratn_u:270: api ca |mūle gaṇḍūṣasekāsava iva bakulair vamyate puṣpavṛṣtyā madhvātāmre taruṇyā mukhaśaśini cirāc campakāny adya bhānti |
GK20hdratn_u:271: ākarṇyāśokapādāhatiṣu ca raṇatāṃ nirbharaṃ nūpurāṇāṃ jhaṅkārasyānugītair anukaraṇam ivārabhyate bhṛṅgasārthaiḥ || 18 || (1.18)
GK20hdratn_u:280: tataḥ praviśati vāsavadattā kāñcanamālā sāgarikā vibhavataś ca parīvārāḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:289: adha kettia dūre dāṇiṃ so rattāsoapāavo jahiṃ mae bhaavado maaṇassa pūā ṇivvattidavvā |
GK20hdratn_u:294: iaṃ khu ṇirantarubbhiṇṇakusumasohiṇī bhaṭṭiṇīe parigahidā māhavīladā |
GK20hdratn_u:295: esā khu avarā ṇomāliāladā jāe aālakusumasamuggamasaddhālueṇa bhaṭṭiṇā appā āāsīadi |
GK20hdratn_u:296: tā edaṃ adikkamia dīsadi jjevva so rattāsoapāavo jahiṃ devī pūaṃ ṇivvattaissadi |
GK20hdratn_u:304: aaṃ so rattāsoapāavo jahiṃ pūaṃ nivvattaissaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:305: teṇa hi me pūāṇimittāiṃ uvaaraṇāiṃ uvaṇehi |
GK20hdratn_u:313: jassa daṃsaṇapadhādo rakkhīadi tassa jjevva diṭṭhigoaraṃ paḍidā bhave |
GK20hdratn_u:317: kīsa tumaṃ ajja maaṇamahūsavaparāhīṇe pariaṇe sāriaṃ ujjhia idha āadā |
GK20hdratn_u:319: edaṃ pi savvaṃ pūovaaraṇaṃ kañcaṇamālāe hatthe samappehi |
GK20hdratn_u:322: tathā kṛtvā kati cit padāni gatvātmagatam |
GK20hdratn_u:324: evvaṃ pi atthi me kodūhalaṃ pekkhiduṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:325: kiṃ jadhā tādassa anteure bhaavaṃ aṇaṅgo accīadi idha vi tadhā jevva kiṃ vā aṇṇadha tti |
GK20hdratn_u:328: jāva idha pūāsamao bhodi tāva ahaṃ pi bhaavantaṃ maaṇaṃ jevva pūiduṃ kusumāiṃ avaciṇissaṃ
GK20hdratn_u:345: eṣā kusumasukumāramūrtir dadhatī niyamena tanutaraṃ madhyam |
GK20hdratn_u:362: sahatthadiṇṇakusumakuṅkumacandaṇathāsaehiṃ sohidaṃ kadua rattāsoapāavaṃ accīadu bhaavaṃ pajjuṇṇo
GK20hdratn_u:375: yad anena na saṃprāptaḥ pāṇisparśotsavas tava || 22 || (1.22)
GK20hdratn_u:381: teṇa hi uvaṇehi me kusumāiṃ vilevaṇaṃ ca |
GK20hdratn_u:390: tā imiṇā sinduvāraviḍavena vāridā bhavia pekkhāmi |
GK20hdratn_u:393: paccakkho jjevva bhaavaṃ kusumāuho pūaṃ paḍicchadi |
GK20hdratn_u:394: tā ahaṃ pi imehiṃ kusumehiṃ idhaṭṭhidā jevva bhaavantaṃ kusumāuhaṃ pūaissaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:402: tā jāva ṇa ko vi pekkhadi tāva jjevva gamissaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:418: astāpāstasamastabhāsi nabhasaḥ pāraṃ prayāte ravāv āsthānīṃ samaye samaṃ nṛpajanaḥ sāyantane saṃpatan |
GK20hdratn_u:419: saṃpraty eva saroruhadyutim uṣaḥ pādāṃs tavāsevituṃ prītyutkarṣakṛto dṛśām udayanasyendor ivodvīkṣate || 23 ||
GK20hdratn_u:423: aaṃ so rāā udaaṇo jassa ahaṃ tādeṇa diṇṇā |
GK20hdratn_u:424: tā parapesaṇakarisidaṃ me sarīraṃ edassa daṃsaṇeṇa bahumadaṃ samvuttaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:443: mandabhāinīe mae pekkhiduṃ pi ciraṃ ṇa pārido aaṃ jaṇo |
GK20hdratn_u:447: devi tvanmukhapaṅkajena śaśinaḥ śobhātiraskāriṇā paśyābjāni vinirjitāni sahasā gacchanti vicchāyatām
GK20hdratn_u:448: śrutvā te parivāravāravanitāgītāni bhṛṅgāṅganā līyante mukulāntareṣu śanakaiḥ saṃjātalajjā iva || 25 ||
GK20hdratn_u:455: adha kahiṃ dāṇiṃ mama hatthe imaṃ sāriaṃ ṇikkhivia gadā me piasahī sāariā bhavissadi |
GK20hdratn_u:457: esā khu ṇiuṇiā ido jjevva āacchadi |
GK20hdratn_u:465: kahiṃ dāṇiṃ tumaṃ vimhaākhittahiaā via idhaṭṭhidaṃ maṃ avadhīria ido adikkamasi |
GK20hdratn_u:472_0: ajja kila bhaṭṭā siripavvadādo āadassa sirikhaṇḍadāsaṇāmadheassa dhammiassa saāsādo
GK20hdratn_u:472_1: aālakusumasaṃjaṇaṇadohalaṃ sikkhia attaṇo parigahidaṃ ṇomāliaṃ kusumasamiddhisohidaṃ
GK20hdratn_u:472_2: karissadi tti edaṃ vuttantaṃ devīe ṇivediduṃ pesida mhi |
GK20hdratn_u:477: diṭṭhā mae sāariā gahidasamuggaacittaphalaavaṭṭiā kaalīharaṃ pavisantī |
GK20hdratn_u:482: tataḥ praviśati gṛhītacitraphalakā madanāvasthāṃ nāṭayantī sāgarikā |
GK20hdratn_u:488: jeṇa jjevva diṭṭhametteṇa īdiso saṃtāvo vaṭṭadi puṇo vi taṃ jevva pekkhiduṃ ahilasasi tti aho de mūḍhadā |
GK20hdratn_u:490: jammado pahudi saha saṃvaḍḍhidaṃ imaṃ jaṇaṃ pariccaia khaṇamettadaṃsaṇaparicidaṃ jaṇaṃ aṇuacchanto ṇa lajjasi |
GK20hdratn_u:497: ṇijjidasurāsuro bhavia itthījaṇaṃ paharanto ṇa lajjasi |
GK20hdratn_u:498: savvadhā mama mandabhāiṇīe imiṇā duṇṇimitteṇa avassaṃ maraṇaṃ uvaṭṭhidaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:500: tā jāva ṇa ko vi idha āacchadi tāva ālekkhasamappidaṃ taṃ ahimadaṃ jaṇaṃ pekkhia jadhāsamīhidaṃ karissaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:501: sāvaṣṭambham ekamanā bhūtvā nāṭyena phalakaṃ gṛhītvā niḥśvas ya |
GK20hdratn_u:502: jai vi adisaddhaseṇa vevadi aaṃ adimettaṃ me aggahattho tadhā vi tassa jaṇassa aṇṇo daṃsaṇovāo ṇatthi tti jadhā tadhā ālihia pekkhissaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:509: kiṃ uṇa esā garuāṇurāākhittahiaā ālihantī ṇa maṃ pekkhadi |
GK20hdratn_u:510: tā jāva diṭṭhipadhaṃ se pariharia ṇirūvaissaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:516: adha vā ṇa kamalāaraṃ vajjia rāahaṃsī aṇṇassiṃ ahiramadi |
GK20hdratn_u:520: kiṃ uṇa ṇivaḍantabāhasalilā me diṭṭhī pekkhiduṃ ṇa pahavadi |
GK20hdratn_u:521: ūrdhvam aśrūṇi saṃharantī susaṃgatāṃ dṛṣṭvottarīyeṇa pracchādayantī vilokya smitaṃ kṛtvā |
GK20hdratn_u:536: kiṃ uṇa suṇṇaṃ via cittaṃ paḍibhādi |
GK20hdratn_u:537: tā ahaṃ pi ālihia radisaṇādhaṃ karissaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:546: jādiso tae kāmadevo ālihido tādisī mae radī ālihidā |
GK20hdratn_u:547: tā aṇṇadhāsaṃbhāviṇi kiṃ tuha ediṇā ālavideṇa |
GK20hdratn_u:555: tā tadhā karesu jadhā ṇa avaro ko vi edaṃ vuttantaṃ jāṇissadi |
GK20hdratn_u:559: īdisassa kaṇṇaāraanassa avassaṃ jevva īdise vare ahilāseṇa hodavvaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:560: tadhā vi jadhā ṇa ko vi avaro edaṃ vuttantaṃ jāṇissadi tadhā karemi |
GK20hdratn_u:561: edāe uṇa medhāviṇīe sāriāe ettha kāraṇeṇa hodavvaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:562: kadā vi esā imassa ālāvassa gahidakkharā kassa vi purado mantaissadi tti |
GK20hdratn_u:565: ado vi me adhiadaraṃ saṃtāvo vaṭṭadi |
GK20hdratn_u:570: jāva imādo digghiādo ṇaliṇīvattaāiṃ muṇāliāo a geṇhia lahuṃ lahuṃ āacchāmi |
GK20hdratn_u:571: niṣkramya punaḥ praviṣṭā nāṭyena nalinīpattrāṇi sāgarikāyā hṛdaye nikṣipati |
GK20hdratn_u:579: piasahi visamaṃ pemmaṃmaraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ ṇavaram ekkaṃ || 26 || (2.1)
GK20hdratn_u:582: kaṇṭhe kṛttāvaśeṣaṃ kanakamayam adhaḥ śṛṅkhalādāma karṣan krāntvā dvārāṇi helācalacaraṇaraṇatkiṅkiṇīcakravālaḥ
GK20hdratn_u:584: prabhraṣṭo 'yaṃ plavaṅgaḥ praviśati nṛpater mandiraṃ mandurāyāḥ || 27 ||
GK20hdratn_u:585: api ca |naṣṭaṃ varṣavarair manuṣyagaṇanābhāvād apāsya trapām antaḥ kañcukikañcukasya viśati trāsād ayaṃ vāmanaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:586: paryantāśrayibhir nijasya sadṛśaṃ nāmnaḥ kirātaiḥ kṛtaṃ kubjā nīcatayaiva yānti śanakair ātmekṣaṇāśaṅkinaḥ (2.21) Susaṃgatā |
GK20hdratn_u:590: eso kkhu duṭṭhavāṇaro ido jjevva āacchadi |
GK20hdratn_u:601: kadā vi ko vi taṃ pekkhissadi |
GK20hdratn_u:605: eso vi dadhibhattalampaḍo edaṃ pañjaraṃ ugghāḍia duṭṭhavāṇaro adikkanto |
GK20hdratn_u:606: esā khu medhāviṇī uḍḍīṇā aṇnado gacchadi |
GK20hdratn_u:620: puṇo vi duṭṭhavāṇaro jjevva āacchadi tti |
GK20hdratn_u:625: bhaṭṭiṇo parivāsavattī khu eso ajja vasantao |
GK20hdratn_u:640: jeṇa diṇṇametteṇa jjevva dohalaeṇa īdisī ṇomāliā saṃvuttā jeṇa ṇirantarubbhiṇṇakusumagucchacchādidaviḍavā uvahasantī via lakkhīadi devīparigahidaṃ māhavīladaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:643: eso kkhu piavaasso tassa dohalaassa laddhappaccaadāe parokkhaṃ pi taṃ ṇomāliaṃ paccakkhaṃ via kusumidaṃ pekkhanto harisupphullaloaṇo ido jjevva āacchadi |
GK20hdratn_u:649: uddāmotkalikāṃ vipāṇḍurarucaṃ prārabdhajṛmbhāṃ kṣaṇād āyāsaṃ śvasanodgamair aviralair ātanvatīm ātmanaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:650: adyodyānalatām imāṃ samadanāṃ nārīm ivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ paśyan kopavipāṭaladyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmy aham || 29 || (2.4)
GK20hdratn_u:660: tad ādeśaya mārgaṃ yena vayam api tadālokanena cakṣuṣaḥ phalam anubhavāmaḥ
GK20hdratn_u:666: ākarṇya sabhayaṃ nivṛtya rājānaṃ haste gṛhītvā sasaṃbhramam |
GK20hdratn_u:674: edassiṃ baulapāave ko vi bhūdo paḍivasadi |

GK20hdratn_u:1660: ekko uṇa kheḍaṇao avassaṃ deveṇa pekkhidavvo |
GK20hdratn_u:1682: tathā hi ākṣipto jayakuñjareṇa turagān nirvarṇayan vallabhān saṃgītadhvaninā hṛtaḥ kṣitibhujāṃ goṣṭhīṣu tiṣṭhan kṣaṇam |
GK20hdratn_u:1683: sadyo vismṛtasiṃhalendravibhavaḥ kakṣāpradeśeṣv aho dvāḥsthenaiva kutūhalena mahatā grāmyo yathāhaṃ kṛtaḥ || 75 || (4.12)
GK20hdratn_u:1685: adya khalu cirāt svāminaṃ drakṣyāmīti yat satyam ānandātiśayena kim apy avasthāntaram anubhavāmi
GK20hdratn_u:1687: vivṛddhiṃ kampasya prathayatitarāṃ sādhvasavaśād avispaṣṭāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ tirayatitarāṃ bāṣpapaṭalaiḥ
GK20hdratn_u:1688: skhaladvarṇāṃ vāṇīṃ jaḍayatitarāṃ gadgadatayā jarāyāḥ sāhāyyaṃ mama hi paritoṣo 'dya kurute (4.93) Vidūṣakaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:1695: saiveyaṃ ratnamālā yā devena rājaputryai prasthānakāle datteti |
GK20hdratn_u:1699: tat kiṃ vasantakād avagacchāmi prabhavam asyāḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:1703: mahati rājakule ratnānāṃ bāhulyān na durlabho bhūṣaṇānāṃ saṃvādaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:1757: ciram api sthitvā yat kathanīyaṃ tad idānīm eva kathyatām |
GK20hdratn_u:1763: yāsau siṃhaleśvareṇa svaduhitā ratnāvalī nāmāyuṣmatī vāsavadattāṃ dagdhām upaśrutya devāya pūrvaprārthitā satī dattā |
GK20hdratn_u:1775: sā ca yuṣmadantikam ānīyamānā yānabhaṅgāt sāgare nimagnā |
GK20hdratn_u:1787: | vahanabhaṅgapatitotthitau nanv etāv eva te nidarśanam |
GK20hdratn_u:1799: harmyāṇāṃ hemaśṛṅgaśriyam iva nicayair arciṣām ādadhānaḥ sāndrodyānadrumāgraglapanapiśunitātyantatīvrābhitāpaḥ
GK20hdratn_u:1800: kurvan krīḍāmahīdhraṃ sajalajaladharaśyāmalaṃ dhūmapātair eṣa ploṣārtayoṣijjana iha sahasaivotthito 'ntaḥpure 'gniḥ || 77 || (4.14)
GK20hdratn_u:1802: kariṣyann iva taṃ satyaṃ manye 'gnir ayam utthitaḥ || 78 || (4.15)
GK20hdratn_u:1820: esā khu mae ṇigghiṇāe idha saṃjamidā sāariā vivajjadi |
GK20hdratn_u:1843: virama virama vahne muñca dhūmānubandhaṃ prakaṭayasi kim uccair arciṣāṃ cakravālam |
GK20hdratn_u:1844: virahahutabhujāhaṃ yo na dagdhaḥ priyāyāḥ pralayadahanabhāsā tasya kiṃ tvaṃ karoṣi || 79 ||
GK20hdratn_u:1847: mama dukkhakāriṇīe vaaṇādo evvaṃ ajjhavasidaṃ ajjautteṇa |
GK20hdratn_u:1855: tan mamāpi dṛṣṭarājaputrīvipatter yuktam ātmānam āhutīkartum |
GK20hdratn_u:1859: kim idam akāraṇa eva bharatakulaṃ saṃśayatulām āropitam |
GK20hdratn_u:1866: samantado pajjalido hudavaho ajja dukkhāvasāṇaṃ me karissadi |
GK20hdratn_u:1875: tā edaṃ pekkhia puṇo me jīvidāsā saṃvuttā |
GK20hdratn_u:1881: muhūrtam api sahyatāṃ bahula eṣa dhūmodgamo hahā dhig idam aṃśukaṃ jvalati te stanāt pracyutam
GK20hdratn_u:1882: muhuḥ skhalasi kiṃ kathaṃ nigaḍasaṃyatāsi drutaṃ nayāmi bhavatīm itaḥ priyatame 'valambasva mām || 80 || (4.17)
GK20hdratn_u:1888: vyaktaṃ lagno 'pi bhavatīṃ na dhakṣati hutāśanaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:1889: yataḥ saṃtāpam evāyaṃ sparśas te harati priye || 81 || (4.18)
GK20hdratn_u:1892: kvāsau gato hutavahas tadavastham etad antaḥpuraṃ ...
GK20hdratn_u:1914: svapne matir bhramati kiṃ nv idam indrajālam || 82 || (4.19)
GK20hdratn_u:1918: bhaṇidaṃ khu teṇa dāsīe puttaeṇa indajālieṇa jadhā |
GK20hdratn_u:1919: avassaṃ jevva deveṇa ekko me kheḍaṇao pekkhidavvo tti |
GK20hdratn_u:1945: esā khu sāariādo pāvida tti bhaṇia amaccajoandharāaṇeṇa mama hatthe ṇikkhittā |
GK20hdratn_u:1950: katham asau mamānivedya kiṃ cit kariṣyati |
GK20hdratn_u:1954: yathā susadṛśī vasantakasya kaṇṭhe ratnamālā asyāś ca sāgarāt prāptis tathā vyaktam eveyaṃ siṃhaleśvarasya duhitā ratnāvalī |
GK20hdratn_u:1988: ṇa kkhu īdiso sāmaṇṇajaṇassa paricchao bhodi tti |
GK20hdratn_u:1997: nanv iyaṃ te jyāyasī bhaginī duḥkham āste |
GK20hdratn_u:2015: amaccajoandharāaṇeṇa ettiaṃ kālaṃ dujjaṇīkida mhi jeṇa jāṇanteṇa vi ṇa me ṇivedidaṃ |
GK20hdratn_u:2018: devyā madvacanād yathābhyupagataḥ patyur viyogas tathā sā devasya kalatrasaṃghaṭanayā duḥkhaṃ mayā sthāpitā |
GK20hdratn_u:2019: tasyāḥ prītim ayaṃ kariṣyati jagatsvāmitvalābhaḥ prabhoḥ satyaṃ darśayituṃ tathāpi vadanaṃ śaknomi no lajjayā || 83 || (4.20)
GK20hdratn_u:2020: atha vā kiṃ kriyata īdṛśam atyantamānanīyeṣv api niranurodhavṛtti svāmibhaktivratam |
GK20hdratn_u:2039: yo 'syāḥ pāṇigrahaṇaṃ kariṣyati sa sārvabhaumo rājā bhaviṣyatīti |
GK20hdratn_u:2040: tatas tatpratyayād asmābhiḥ svāmino 'rthe bahuśaḥ prārthyamānenāpi siṃhaleśvareṇa devyā vāsavadattāyāś
GK20hdratn_u:2045: tadā lāvaṇake devī dagdheti prasiddhim utpādya tadantikaṃ bābhravyaḥ prahitaḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:2049: atheyaṃ devīhaste kim ity anucintya sthāpitā |
GK20hdratn_u:2051: aṇācakkhidaṃ pi edaṃ jāṇīadi jjevva jadhā |
GK20hdratn_u:2052: anteuragadā suheṇa de daṃsaṇapadhaṃ gamissadi tti |
GK20hdratn_u:2060: anyathāntaḥpure baddhāyā asyāḥ kuto devena darśanam |
GK20hdratn_u:2063: parijñātāyāś ca bhaginyāḥ saṃprati yathā karaṇīyaṃ tatra devī pramāṇam |
GK20hdratn_u:2066: phuḍāṃ jevva kiṃ ṇa bhaṇāsi jadhā |
GK20hdratn_u:2073: ettiaṃ pi dāva mama bahiṇiāṇurūvaṃ bhodu |
GK20hdratn_u:2074: iti ratnāvalīṃ svakīyair ābharaṇair alaṅkṛtya haste gṛhītvā rājānam upasṛtya |
GK20hdratn_u:2079: ko devyāḥ prasādaṃ na bahu manyate |
GK20hdratn_u:2083: tā tadhā karesu jadhā bandhujaṇaṃ ṇa sumaredi |
GK20hdratn_u:2101: kim ataḥ param api priyam asti |
GK20hdratn_u:2103: nīto vikramabāhur ātmasamatāṃ prāpteyam urvītale sāraṃ sāgarikā sasāgaramahīprāpty ekahetuḥ priyā |
GK20hdratn_u:2104: devī prītim upāgatā ca bhaginīlābhāj jitāḥ kosalāḥ kiṃ nāsti tvayi saty amātyavṛṣabhe yasmin karomi spṛhām || 84 || (4.21)
GK20hdratn_u:2106: urvīm uddāmasasyāṃ janayatu visṛjanvāsavo vṛṣṭim iṣṭām iṣṭais traiviṣṭapānāṃ vidadhatu vidhivatprīṇanaṃ vipramukhyāḥ |
GK20hdratn_u:2107: ākalpāntaṃ ca bhūyat samupacitasukhaḥ saṃgamaḥ sajjanānāṃ niḥśeṣā yāntu śāntiṃ piśunajanagiro durjayā vajralepāḥ || 84 || (4.22)
